sentence: The ad released by state Sen. Chuck Edwards, one of a number of Republicans taking on Cawthorn in the Tar Heel State's primary race, features photos Cawthorn posted on Instagram of himself on a boat, smoking a cigar and drinking a pineapple drink, among others.
author: Mychael Schnell
title: Cawthorn challenger knocks opponent for Instagram use in new ad

sentence: The ad released by state Sen. Chuck Edwards, one of a number of Republicans taking on Cawthorn in the Tar Heel State's primary race, features photos Cawthorn posted on Instagram of himself on a boat, smoking a cigar and drinking a pineapple drink, among others.
